description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the SwDir.dll ActiveX control in Adobe Shockwave Player 11.5.1.601 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code via a long PlayerVersion property value.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3244

description: SQL injection vulnerability in spnews.php in MyBuxScript PTC-BUX allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id parameter in an spnews action to the default URI.  NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3246

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Activities module in vtiger CRM 5.0.4 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the action parameter to phprint.php.  NOTE: the query_string vector is already covered by CVE-2008-3101.3.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3247

description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in the RSS module in vtiger CRM 5.0.4 allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of Admin users for requests that modify the news feed system via the rssurl parameter in a Save action to index.php.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3248

description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in news.php in Rock Band CMS 0.10 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) year and (2) id parameters.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3252

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in TriceraSoft Swift Ultralite 1.032 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or execute arbitrary code via a long string in a .M3U playlist file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3253

description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in Ultimate Player 1.56 beta allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long string in a (1) .m3u or (2) .upl playlist file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3254

description: SQL injection vulnerability in RASH Quote Management System (RQMS) 1.2.2 and earlier, when magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the user parameter in an admin action to the default URI.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3255

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in include/ajax/blogInfo.php in LiveStreet 0.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the URI, as demonstrated by a SCRIPT element in an arbitrary parameter such as the asd parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3256

description: vtiger CRM before 5.1.0 allows remote authenticated users to bypass the permissions on the (1) Account Billing Address and (2) Shipping Address fields in a profile by creating a Sales Order (SO) associated with that profile.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3257

description: vtiger CRM before 5.1.0 allows remote authenticated users, with certain View privileges, to delete (1) attachments, (2) reports, (3) filters, (4) views, and (5) tickets; insert (6) attachments, (7) reports, (8) filters, (9) views, and (10) tickets; and edit (11) reports, (12) filters, (13) views, and (14) tickets via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3258

description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in RASH Quote Management System (RQMS) 1.2.2 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via (1) the search parameter in a search action, (2) the quote parameter in a quote addition, or (3) a User_Name cookie in unspecified administrative actions.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3259

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in LiveStreet 0.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the header of the topic in a comment.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3260

description: update/update_0.1.2_to_0.2.php in LiveStreet 0.2 does not require administrative authentication, which allows remote attackers to perform DROP TABLE operations via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3261

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Self Service UI (SSUI) in IBM Tivoli Identity Manager (ITIM) 5.0.0.5 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the last name field in a profile.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3262

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Google Chrome 2.x and 3.x before 3.0.195.21 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a (1) RSS or (2) Atom feed, related to the rendering of the application/rss+xml content type as XML "active content."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2009-3263

description: The getSVGDocument method in Google Chrome before 3.0.195.21 omits an unspecified "access check," which allows remote web servers to bypass the Same Origin Policy and conduct cross-site scripting attacks via unknown vectors, related to a user's visit to a different web server that hosts an SVG document.
